title: Live Cryptocurrency Data Auto-Refresh
description: Verify that live cryptocurrency price, volume, and change data is fetched correctly from the CoinGecko API and updates automatically every 30 seconds without page refresh.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage.
Check initial cryptocurrency data (price, volume, and change) is displayed in the live-updated price table.
Wait for 30 seconds.
Verify that the cryptocurrency data table refreshes automatically with updated data without a page reload.
Disable network connection.
Wait for another 30 seconds to attempt update.
Verify that a meaningful error or fallback message is displayed or old data remains visible without crashing the app.

title: Portfolio Holdings Persistence
description: Ensure that user portfolio holdings are correctly added, updated, and removed with data persisting across browser sessions via localStorage.

steps.description: Navigate to the portfolio section.
Add a new cryptocurrency holding with valid coin, amount, and purchase price.
Confirm the new holding appears in the portfolio list with correct details.
Refresh the browser page.
Verify the portfolio holding persists and loads correctly from localStorage.
Update the holding amount and save.
Check the updated amount is displayed and persisted after page refresh.
Remove the holding from portfolio.
Confirm the holding is removed and not present after refreshing the page.

title: Price Alert Notification Trigger
description: Verify that user-configured price alerts trigger notification alerts correctly based on live price changes.

steps.description: Navigate to portfolio and add a price alert for a chosen coin with a target price above current market price.
Check that the price alert configuration is saved and visible in the alert list.
Simulate or wait until the coin price reaches or exceeds the target price.
Verify that a browser notification alert is displayed to the user.
Set a price alert with target price below current price to check downward triggers.
Confirm alert triggers properly when price drops to threshold.
Check that alerts can be disabled or deleted and no notifications are sent afterward.

title: Interactive Coin Line Chart Updates
description: Validate that the line chart updates correctly when selecting different coins and timeframes, accurately reflecting price trends.

steps.description: Open the coin line chart component.
Select a coin from the available filter options.
Confirm the chart updates to display price data for the selected coin.
Change the timeframe selection (e.g., 24 hours, 7 days, 30 days).
Verify the chart re-renders and correctly reflects the selected timeframeâ€™s price trend.
Switch to another coin and timeframe combination.
Ensure chart updates smoothly without errors and data corresponds to selections.
Test edge cases such as selecting unsupported or no data coins.
Confirm appropriate handling, e.g., display of 'No Data' message or empty chart.

title: Responsive Design on Desktop and Mobile
description: Check that the entire CryptoTracker web app UI, including table layout, portfolio, charts, and navigation, responds correctly on different screen sizes and devices.

steps.description: Access the site on a desktop browser with a large screen.
Verify all components (hero, about, observation, portfolio, footer) render fully and align as per design.
Resize browser window to tablet viewport dimensions.
Ensure UI adjusts correctly with no overlapping elements or horizontal scroll.
Open the site on a mobile device simulator or real mobile device.
Confirm the navigation menus, tables, charts, and portfolio controls are usable and visually correct.
Test interactive elements such as dropdowns and buttons for touch responsiveness.
Validate that animations and gradients do not degrade performance or accessibility.

title: Third-Party Live Chat Integration Functionality
description: Verify the third-party live chat widget loads correctly, allows user interaction, and supports sending and receiving messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage and wait for the live chat widget to load.
Confirm the live chat icon appears and is accessible.
Open the live chat widget.
Send a test message through the chat interface.
Verify the sent message appears in the chat history.
Check that incoming messages (test with support if possible) are displayed correctly.
Ensure no errors occur during chat usage and that the widget remains responsive on desktop and mobile.

title: Google Analytics Integration Verification
description: Ensure that Google Analytics is correctly integrated and records user visits, page views, and interactions in real-time.

steps.description: Open the CryptoTracker site in a new browser session.
Verify Google Analytics tracking script is loaded on the page.
Navigate through different pages and interact with portfolio and charts.
Confirm that corresponding pageview and event data are sent to Google Analytics (validated via browser devtools or GA real-time dashboard).
Refresh the page and close the browser tab.
Verify that session data reflects these user interactions.

title: UNIX Time Conversion Utility Accuracy
description: Validate that the custom UNIX time conversion utility correctly converts timestamps to human-readable formats consistent with user locale and display requirements.

steps.description: Input several UNIX timestamps into the utility covering different dates and times (including edge cases like leap year, DST transitions).
Verify the output displays correctly formatted date and time strings.
Test conversion of invalid or out-of-range timestamps.
Confirm that errors are handled gracefully and invalid inputs produce appropriate fallback outputs or error messages.
